KVM is a little harder to setup, but I'm reluctant to recommend installing a full GUI on a server.
it is my laptop.. so I can vbox is simplere then
Don't get me wrong, I love Vbox, it's just I'd be reluctant to tie up a bunch of system resources with Ubuntu's bloated default GUI. Use a window manager instead if you have to.
